_header: Of Saint George our Ladys knight
Subjects: George, saint; introductions, to prose texts
_description: Introductory couplet to an English prose prayer

BodDou1.Transcription:
Of saynt George oure ladyes knyghtOf whome no torment coude haue
                    myght

Thompson.Note:
Hamer (1995)
XHamer,  Richard. 
             A Manuscript Index to the Index of Middle English Verse.
         London: British Library, 1995 lists as unidentified, missing or
                    destroyed.
